body:
Im RexNicky and I believe I was wrong fully banned.  It was for fly-hacking.  I don't own a hacked client or would ever use one on here.  This was the first server Ive played on...I join over 2 years ago.  During the time I was in a call and was watching a YT video.  That made me lag really bad.  During the game my account would lock up.  That is where I think it was from.  
     If I am mistaken and you are right I would do anything to get unbanned.  I have no proof against it.  This server is so much fun and I would hate to leave it.  I would do anything at all.  I could help catch people or spectate games.  Anything!!!!  I think you get the point.  Thanks for your time.  Hope to be able to play Nebula again!


~RexNicky

title: I Think I was Banned Wrongfully

replies.body:
Please write your appeal here - https://avicus.net/forums/new?utf8=%E2%9C%93&topic_id=50

Make sure to read these guidelines before writing your appeal.

Good luck.
